English Translation: It is not located over there.
Where would you like to go to eat?

Transliteration: wǒ bù xiǎng zài zhèr hē.
English Translation: I would not like to drink here.

Transliteration: wǒ bù míng bai shén me?
xiàn zài, hái shì guò yì huǐr?
wǒ yào xiàn zài chī wǔ fàn.
English Translation: I’m going to have lunch now.
What time is it? (lit. “Now at what time?”)

Transliteration: shí èr kuài rén mín bì

English Translation: Do you have ... ?  (lit. “you have / don’t have?” ...)

Transliteration: liù jiā liù shì duō shǎo?
English Translation: Six plus six is how much?
What did you say? (lit. “You speak what?”)

Transliteration: wǒ bù kě yǐ gěi nǐ.
English Translation: I can’t give any to you.

Transliteration: nǐ shuō de tài kuài le.

English Translation: Please ... (as in “Sorry to be bothering you ... ”)

Transliteration: wǒ men yǒu liǎng gè ér zi.
liǎng qiān sān bǎi kuài rén mín bì
nǐ jiā lǐ yǒu jǐ gè rén?
English Translation: How many people are there in your family?

Transliteration: nǐ men yào zuò fēi jī qù ma?
English Translation: Are you going to take a plane?

Transliteration: nà tiáo shì yīng huáng dào.
wǒ zhēn de bù zhī dào.

English Translation: I would like to see him.

Transliteration: wǒ xiǎng wǒ yào kàn tā.
English Translation: I think I’m going to see him.
I would not like to leave.

Transliteration: wǒ men kě yǐ yì qǐ zǒu.
wǒ men méi yǒu shí jiān.

English Translation: For how long? (“It has been how long?”)

Transliteration: nǐ bù míng bai shén me?

English Translation: for one week / It has been one week.

Transliteration: nǐ men shén me shí hòu qù le?
wǒ men shì yì qǐ dào de.

English Translation: Heavenly Altar / Temple of Heaven (Beijing historical site)
